title: Scenario-Based UDL-Integrated Curriculum for Applying Digital Learning Theories

context.prior_knowledge: Experience with foundational digital learning tools and general understanding of educational theories
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen employee competencies within organizations, combining asynchronous online learning with offline workshops. Requires flexible learning pathways considering learners' diverse work backgrounds.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze digital learning design problems in real corporate settings using scenario-based approaches and propose solutions.
Learners can design digital learning materials reflecting diverse learner needs according to UDL principles.
Learners can create interactive learning content using the Articulate Rise 360 tool.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
